module MemoriaDeInstrucoes(	input [5:0] Endereco,
		output [5:0] Opcode,
		output [4:0] CampoA,
		output [4:0] CampoB,
		output [4:0] CampoC,
		output [10:0] CampoD );

	wire [31:0] Memoria [60:0];
	wire [31:0] Instrucao;

	memoria[0]	=	32'b001110_00000_11011_0000000000000000;
	memoria[1]	=	32'b001110_00000_11100_0000000000100000;
	memoria[2]	=	32'b001110_00000_11101_0000000000101111;
	memoria[3]	=	32'b010100_00000000000000000000100110;
	memoria[4]	=	32'b010000_11011_10001_0000000000000000;
	memoria[5]	=	32'b001111_11011_00001_0000000000000000;
	memoria[6]	=	32'b001110_00000_00010_0000000000000001;
	memoria[7]	=	32'b011001_00001_00010_00011_00000000000;
	memoria[8]	=	32'b011010_00001_00010_00100_00000000000;
	memoria[9]	=	32'b001000_00011_00100_00101_00000000000;
	memoria[10]	=	32'b010001_00101_00000_0000000000010001;
	memoria[11]	=	32'b001110_00000_00110_0000000000000001;
	memoria[12]	=	32'b011011_00110_00000_11110_00000000000;
	memoria[13]	=	32'b000100_11101_11101_1111111111111111;
	memoria[14]	=	32'b001111_11101_11111_0000000000000000;
	memoria[15]	=	32'b010101_11111_00000_0000000000000000;
	memoria[16]	=	32'b010100_00000000000000000000100011;
	memoria[17]	=	32'b001111_11011_00111_0000000000000000;
	memoria[18]	=	32'b001110_00000_01000_0000000000000001;
	memoria[19]	=	32'b000011_00111_01000_01001_00000000000;
	memoria[20]	=	32'b011011_01001_00000_10001_00000000000;
	memoria[21]	=	32'b000100_11011_11011_0000000000000001;
	memoria[22]	=	32'b001110_00000_11111_0000000000011010;
	memoria[23]	=	32'b010000_11101_11111_0000000000000000;
	memoria[24]	=	32'b000100_11101_11101_0000000000000001;
	memoria[25]	=	32'b010100_00000000000000000000000100;
	memoria[26]	=	32'b011011_11110_00000_01010_00000000000;
	memoria[27]	=	32'b000100_11011_11011_1111111111111111;
	memoria[28]	=	32'b001111_11011_01011_0000000000000000;
	memoria[29]	=	32'b000110_01010_01011_01100_00000000000;
	memoria[30]	=	32'b011011_01100_00000_11110_00000000000;
	memoria[31]	=	32'b000100_11101_11101_1111111111111111;
	memoria[32]	=	32'b001111_11101_11111_0000000000000000;
	memoria[33]	=	32'b010101_11111_00000_0000000000000000;
	memoria[34]	=	32'b010100_00000000000000000000100011;
	memoria[35]	=	32'b000100_11101_11101_1111111111111111;
	memoria[36]	=	32'b001111_11101_11111_0000000000000000;
	memoria[37]	=	32'b010101_11111_00000_0000000000000000;
	memoria[38]	=	32'b001111_11011_01101_0000000000000000;
	memoria[39]	=	32'b010110_00000_01110_00000_00000000000;
	memoria[40]	=	32'b011011_01110_00000_01101_00000000000;
	memoria[41]	=	32'b010000_11011_01101_0000000000000000;
	memoria[42]	=	32'b001111_11011_01111_0000000000000001;
	memoria[43]	=	32'b001111_11011_10000_0000000000000000;
	memoria[44]	=	32'b011011_10000_00000_10001_00000000000;
	memoria[45]	=	32'b000100_11011_11011_0000000000000010;
	memoria[46]	=	32'b001110_00000_11111_0000000000110010;
	memoria[47]	=	32'b010000_11101_11111_0000000000000000;
	memoria[48]	=	32'b000100_11101_11101_0000000000000001;
	memoria[49]	=	32'b010100_00000000000000000000000100;
	memoria[50]	=	32'b011011_11110_00000_00001_00000000000;
	memoria[51]	=	32'b000100_11011_11011_1111111111111110;
	memoria[52]	=	32'b011011_00001_00000_01111_00000000000;
	memoria[53]	=	32'b010000_11011_01111_0000000000000001;
	memoria[54]	=	32'b001111_11011_00010_0000000000000001;
	memoria[55]	=	32'b011011_00010_00000_10001_00000000000;
	memoria[56]	=	32'b011011_10001_00000_00011_00000000000;
	memoria[57]	=	32'b010111_00011_00000_0000000000000000;
	memoria[58]	=	32'b000000_00000000000000000000000000;
	memoria[59]	=	32'b010100_00000000000000000000111100;
	memoria[60]	=	32'b000001_00000000000000000000000000;

	assign Instrucao = Memoria[Endereco];
	assign Opcode = Instrucao[31:26];
	assign CampoA = Instrucao[25:21];
	assign CampoB = Instrucao[20:16];
	assign CampoC = Instrucao[15:11];
	assign CampoD = Instrucao[10:0];

endmodule
